text: Hebrew poetry is poetry written in the Hebrew language. It encompasses such things as: * Biblical poetry, the poetry found in the poetic books of the Hebrew Bible * Piyyut, religious Jewish liturgical poetry in Hebrew or Aramaic * Medieval Hebrew poetry written in Hebrew * Modern Hebrew poetry, poetry written after the revival of the Hebrew language See also: *List of Hebrew language poets *Hebrew literature *Israeli literature *Jewish literature Category:Poetry by nation or language
title: Hebrew poetry
